mapper.select: select t1.tplname ,t1.diagnosis from t_b_diagnosis_tpl t1 where t1.removed = '0' and t1.isvalid = 1 and ((t1.orgcode = #{userInfo.orgCode} AND (t1.ispublic = 1 or t1.createby = #{userInfo.id})) or (t1.orgcode is null AND t1.ispublic = 1)) order by t1.orgcode desc , t1.modifyat desc

select t1.id ,t1.tplname ,t1.isvalid , t1.ispublic,t1.diagnosis,t1.createby,t1.createAt, t3.username as createUserName, if(t1.createby=#{userInfo.id} ,1,0) as isSelf from t_b_diagnosis_tpl t1 LEFT JOIN t_p_s_user t3 on t1.createby = t3.id where t1.removed = '0'
and ((t1.orgcode = #{userInfo.orgCode} AND (t1.ispublic = 1 or t1.createby = #{userInfo.id})) or (t1.orgcode is null AND t1.ispublic = 1 AND t1.isvalid = 1))
and t1.orgcode is null
and t1.tplname like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and t1.ispublic = #{isPublic}
and t1.isvalid = #{isValid}
order by t1.orgcode desc , t1.modifyat desc
